canWithdraw(address,address).details: called from GrantEscrow when claiming funds in escrow

params._from: The address of the Grant Orga

depositGrant(address).details: only available for registered organisationsfunction also called by fallback receive()

params._contestCreator: address of the organisation who created the contest

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setWithdrawStatus(address,address,bool).details: can only be called by trusted contracts, in this case: VerifySignature.sol

params._from: The address of the Grant Orga

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawGrant(address).details:
only available for registered organisations.
requires the Granter to have signed the transaction.
Re-entrancy - changing the state of unlockFunds in VerifySignature to false ensures that the function can not be run multiple times in parallel. A second call would not pass the require.

params._contestCreator: address of the organisation who created the contest.

canWithdraw(address,address).notice: Checks the boolean of mapping unlockFunds

fundsInEscrow(address).notice: Return the amount put in escrow by the contest creator

setContractsAddresses(address,address).notice: Set smart contract addresses of YugoDao and VerifySignature

setWithdrawStatus(address,address,bool).notice: Set the authorisation to withdraw funds
